Html:
Hello,

I've some problems by reading the following cell-value 11.01.1900 as String value by using such method like PHPExcel_Style_NumberFormat::toFormattedString($cell->getCalculatedValue());

I get always the number 12.

Does someone has any idea how to read such values as a string???

Thx&Regards,

Ami

I do it like this:

$date = PHPExcel_Style_NumberFormat::toFormattedString($data, "M/D/YYYY");

Hi Scott,

thank you for your help, but what about if do not expect a date format in the cell??? In my use case sometimes can be found values which have date format and some times only some characters and I need both values.

What I saw today, was that in WinXP Environment  I didn't had problems with this but in Windows 7 yes!!!!
